tool.name: Cluster Prevalence Over Samples
tool.description: Plot the prevalence of clusters over sample from the TSV output of PyClone-VI.

repeat.name: timepoints
repeat.title: Annotate timepoint
repeat.help: Annotate every timepoints of experiments. Timepoints without annotation will not be plotted!!

param.name: event_id
param.label: Event ID
param.help: Must match an ID from the Pyclone-VI TSV output

param.name: start_date
param.label: Start Date
param.help: In days from the start point/birth

tool.help: This tool plots cluster prevalence over samples from PyClone-VI tabular output.
